planet.name: HR 8799 d
HD 218396 d
planet.description: HR 8799 is a young Lambda Boötis star in the constellation of Pegasus. It hosts a debris disk and at least 4 planets. The inner two planets have spectral energy distributions that best match dusty L7 dwarfs.
planet.imagedescription: This image shows three planets orbiting the star HR 8799. It was obtained with the Keck II telescope on Hawaii. Credit: C. Marois et al., NRC Canada.
